mapper.insert: insert into WS_TASK_ITEMS (taskitemid, taskid, wsadd, wsusername, wspassword, params, results) values (#{taskitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wsadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wsusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wspassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{results,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update WS_TASK_ITEMS set taskid = #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wsadd = #{wsadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wsusername = #{wsusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wspassword = #{wspassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, results = #{results,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where taskitemid = #{taskitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select taskitemid, taskid, wsadd, wsusername, wspassword, params, results from WS_TASK_ITEMS
